title: 115A.914 ADMINISTRATION; COUNTY PLANNING AND ORDINANCES.
text:
For purposes of implementing and enforcing the waste tire programs in sections 115A.90 to 115A.914, the agency may exercise the regulatory and enforcement powers of the agency under chapters 115 and 116.
The agency shall adopt rules for administration of waste tire collector and processor permits and waste tire collection.
Counties shall include collection and processing of waste tires in the solid waste management plan prepared under sections 115A.42 to 115A.46 and shall adopt ordinances under sections 400.16 and 473.811 for management of waste tires that embody, but may be more restrictive than, agency rules.
